welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kenzingen, a charming city known for its picturesque streets, rich history and warm hospitality. We invite you to immerse yourself in our culture and explore all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
